Containers.Name: Custom SMB Shares
Containers.Description: Create and manage custom SMB/Samba shares beyond Unraid's built-in share management. Define shares with full control over paths, permissions, access settings, and advanced Samba options. Features include path browser, user/group selection, quick presets (Basic, Read-Only, Secure, macOS, Time Machine), and import/export configuration.
Containers.Overview: Create custom SMB shares with full control over Samba configuration options. Supports advanced settings like VFS objects, permissions masks, and Time Machine compatibility.
Containers.Changes: ### 2025.01.18 - Initial release - Custom SMB share creation with validation - Path browser with file tree navigation - User/group browser with search - Quick presets (Basic, Read-Only, Secure, macOS, Time Machine) - Import/Export configuration (JSON) - Automatic Samba configuration and reload - Service status display with auto-refresh
